et inclusion         Nous sommes un employeur garantissant l égalité des chances et nous sommes fiers de faire de la diversité une force pour notre entreprise  Le groupe s engage à reconnaître et à About Four Seasons   Four Seasons is powered by our people  We are a collective of individuals who crave to become better  to push ourselves to new heights and to treat each other as we wish to be treated in return  Our team members around the world create amazing experiences for our guests  residents  and partners through a commitment to luxury with genuine heart  We know that the best way to enable our people to deliver these exceptional guest experiences is through a world class employee experience and company culture    At Four Seasons  we believe in recognizing a familiar face  welcoming a new one and treating everyone we meet the way we would want to be treated ourselves  Whether you work with us  stay with us  live with us or discover with us  we believe our purpose is to create impressions that will stay with you for a lifetime  It comes from our belief that life is richer when we truly connect to the people and the world around us   About the location  Bathed in natural light  our seaside Hotel cascades down a hillside toward the Atlantic  Perched on a beach just 10 minutes from the heart of Morocco s largest and liveliest city  the sweeping views you ll find from your private balcony easily fulfill the romantic reputation that precedes Casablanca  With architectural marvels both historic and modern  a cutting edge art scene and world class restaurants  allow us to show off the best of our alluring port city  starting with a plate of fresh local seafood prepared à la minute at Bleu  Our Oceanfront sanctuary offering a resort like atmosphere minutes from the city s key business districts and cultural landmarks opened in November 2015  and has 186 rooms  3 food and beverage outlets including a grill   seafood restaurant  a modern Moroccan lobby lounge serving exquisite tea times and a poolside restaurant famous for its Sundays barbecues  an outdoor pool with private poolside cabanas  fitness center  and a stunning spa offering bespoke treatments that pay tribute to ancestral beauty techniques and ancient Moroccan traditions at Le Spa     About the role  The Spa Receptionist proactively welcomes guests  is knowledgeable about treatments  products and services offered as well as pricing  and scheduling   What you will do   The Spa Receptionist is a central part of the Spa Team whose main objective is to ensure our guests have a smooth arrival  information gathering and departure experience in the Spa  As the first and last impression of the Spa  this high profile department carries a special responsibility  The role involves the active promotion of spa therapies and treatments both on the phone and in person ensuring that accurate reservations are made  Weekend shifts required  Perform all morning and evening shift tasks  Distribute appointments fairly  Advise customers of products for sale according to their needs  Ability to meet exceed sales targets  Know and apply cash register closing procedures  Ensure the well being of each customer  Refer to customers by name whenever possible  Coordinate the work of team members on a daily basis  Maintain the reception and relaxation areas throughout the day  Work with the Security department to manage forgotten items in accordance with Four Seasons internal procedures  Keep the Manager or Assistant Manager informed of all customer complaints  Adhere to Four Seasons standards   What you bring   Outgoing personality and a can do approach to any task   personifying luxury guest service Previous experience within luxury hospitality preferable  Understanding of Spa environments and treatments beneficial  Excellent communication skills and the ability to take a proactive approach to understand guests  needs and desires  Exceptional customer service skills and Problem solving ability Good level of reading  writing  and spoken English and French is highly required  Computer skills  word  excel   PowerPoint presentation  Able to operate the opera systemFamiliarity with Spa Booking Software     What we offer    Competitive Salary  wages  and a comprehensive benefits package Excellent Training and Development opportunities Complimentary Accommodation at other Four Seasons Hotels and Resort Complimentary Dry Cleaning for Employee Uniforms Complimentary Employee Meals

Réception et contrôle des marchandises     Réceptionner les produits en vérifiant les quantités  les références  les dates de péremption et l état des marchandises    Enregistrer les entrées de stock et mettre à jour les systèmes informatiques  2  Stockage et organisation     Organiser le stockage des produits selon les catégories  produits laitiers  médicaments  etc   et selon les bonnes pratiques  FIFO  respect des dates de péremption     S assurer du bon état des lieux de stockage  température  hygrométrie  propreté   3  Gestion des dates de péremption et alertes     Surveiller les dates de péremption et identifier les produits proches de l expiration    Mettre en place des alertes et des plans d action pour écouler rapidement les produits périssables    Identifier les produits en rotation rapide ou dormants et ajuster la gestion des stocks en conséquence  4  Hygiène et sécurité     Maintenir un environnement de stockage propre et conforme aux normes d hygiène    Appliquer les normes de sécurité pour la manipulation des produits vétérinaires 5  Inventaire et suivi des stocks     Effectuer des inventaires réguliers et s assurer de l exactitude des données    Gérer les écarts de stock et proposer des actions correctives si nécessaire  6  Suivi des commandes et des expéditions     Réception des commandes de l équipe  commerciale   Facturation sur l ERP   Supervision de la préparation des commandes   Supervision de l expédition des commande   Suivi des expéditions jusqu à destination finale avec les sociétés de transport et les transporteurs internes et externes   Suivi des réclamations clients quant aux problèmes de livraison   Superviser l exécution des commandes clients en collaboration avec les services internes    Gérer les expéditions avec les sociétés de transport et logistique  en veillant à respecter les délais et conditions    Préparer et vérifier les documents d expédition et les factures via l ERP    S assurer que les commandes sont complètes et en bon état avant l expédition  7  Service client et gestion des réclamations     Traiter rapidement les réclamations clients liées aux erreurs d expédition ou à des produits défectueux    Proposer des solutions pour résoudre les problèmes d expédition et améliorer le processus  8  Optimisation des flux de stockage     Proposer des améliorations pour optimiser l utilisation des espaces de stockage et assurer une bonne circulation des produits selon le principe de la marche en avant    Effectuer des inventaires réguliers et analyser les rotations de stock pour réduire les surstocks ou les ruptures  Compétences techniques     Connaissance approfondie des bonnes pratiques de distribution  BPD     Maîtrise des méthodes de gestion de stock  FIFO  LIFO     Capacité à utiliser des logiciels de gestion de stock    Connaissance des normes d hygiène et de sécurité dans un environnement de stockage  Profil recherché   Formation     Diplôme en gestion de stock  logistique  ou tout autre domaine pertinent    Formation ou certification en bonnes pratiques de distribution  BPD  serait un plus  Expérience     Expérience préalable de 2 à 3 ans dans un poste similaire  de préférence dans la gestion de produits pharmaceutiques ou vétérinaires  Compétences     Aptitudes humaines  sérieux  rigueur  caractères non conflictuel   intelligence émotionnelle et aptitude au suivi    Rigueur et sens de l organisation    Sens de l anticipation pour gérer les produits périssables    Sens de l anticipation des réclamations clients quant aux problèmes de livraison des commandes clients   Capacité à travailler avec des outils informatiques de gestion de stock    Connaissance des principes de rotation des stocks et gestion des dates de péremption    Capacité à analyser les données pour anticiper les besoins en réapprovisionnement et optimiser les stocks  Type d emploi   Temps plein  CDI Rémunération   8 000 00DH à 9 000 00DH par mois

The Data Scientist Intern position at Bertrandt Group offers a unique opportunity to work on innovative data science projects in the automotive and aerospace industries  As part of an interdisciplinary team  you will gain hands on experience in data analysis  machine learning  and software development  while contributing to real world solutions  You will have the chance to apply your academic knowledge to solve complex problems  integrate new data sources  and collaborate with industry professionals across different fields   What You Will Do   Conceptualize and Implement Data Science Projects  Work on designing and executing projects that address real world challenges   Data Integration and Preprocessing  Incorporate new data sources  clean  and preprocess data to prepare it for analysis   Statistical Analysis and Visualization  Conduct statistical analyses and create clear  insightful visualizations to communicate your findings   Develop Algorithms  Build and implement algorithms for tasks like anomaly detection  pattern recognition  and predictive modeling   Work with LLMs  Utilize large language models  LLMs  for innovative problem solving  including prompt engineering and output validation   Software Development  Design and develop software solutions to integrate your models and analyses into actionable tools   Optimize and Automate  Enhance existing applications  automate workflows  and optimize performance   Collaborate in Cross Functional Teams  Work alongside data scientists  engineers  and project managers to deliver impactful solutions to clients   What You Bring   Academic Background  Currently pursuing or recently completed studies in Data Science  Computer Science  Mathematics  Natural Sciences  or a related field   Technical Skills  Strong proficiency in Python  with experience in software development and algorithm design   Machine Learning Expertise  Knowledge of machine learning frameworks such as scikit learn  TensorFlow  or PyTorch   Statistical Knowledge  Understanding of statistical methods and their application in data analysis   Experience with LLMs  Familiarity with large language models  LLMs  and prompt engineering is a plus   Cloud   Data Technologies  Experience with cloud platforms  databases  and data processing tools is beneficial   Communication Skills  Strong verbal and written communication skills  with the ability to convey technical information to non technical stakeholders   Proactivity  Self driven  proactive approach with a strong sense of responsibility   Language Proficiency  Fluent in English  both written and spoken    What We Offer   Responsible Tasks  Engage in significant  impactful projects from day one   Mobile Work  Flexibility to work remotely and maintain a healthy work life balance   Networking Opportunities  Build connections with professionals throughout the Bertrandt Group   Employee Events  Participate in team building activities and company events to foster collaboration and engagement

Job Title: DevOps Consultant, IgniteTech (Remote) - $60,000/year USD - job post
Link: It s no secret that traditional site reliability teams struggle to keep pace with manual monitoring  reactive troubleshooting  and labor intensive deployments  The rise of AI presents a solution  but many companies fail to fully leverage its potential  resulting in systems that underperform and bottlenecks that stifle innovation  Data shows that 73  of companies struggle with deployment delays and operational downtime  primarily due to outdated processes and lack of AI driven automation  At IgniteTech  we are tackling these issues head on by building AI first cloud solutions that are designed to anticipate and prevent problems before they arise  We focus on integrating AI and machine learning into every facet of cloud infrastructure management  from automated monitoring systems to intelligent CI CD pipelines  This approach creates environments that not only self heal but also continuously evolve  reducing downtime  improving performance  and pushing the boundaries of what cloud services can do  This isn t your typical site reliability role  where you d be reacting to problems and manually intervening when things go wrong  Here  you ll lead the charge in building AI enhanced monitoring systems that detect and resolve 95  of issues before they ever reach end users  You ll also architect and manage AI automated CI CD pipelines that reduce deployment times by 30  while slashing manual interventions  The ideal candidate thrives in an AI driven environment  is excited by the prospect of automation first solutions  and enjoys pushing the envelope of cloud infrastructure design  In this role  you ll join a global team of innovators who are redefining cloud infrastructure  Your work will play a key role in our mission to deliver next gen  AI driven operational excellence  We re seeking someone who is passionate about AI and ready to make a lasting impact on the future of cloud services  If that s you  we encourage you to apply and be part of something revolutionary    What you will be doing   Implementing AI based monitoring services to automatically detect  predict  and resolve issues before they impact operations Managing CI CD pipelines with AI driven automation to enhance deployment efficiency and reduce manual intervention    What you will NOT be doing   Focusing solely on manual monitoring  troubleshooting  and maintenance of systems  your goal will be to get AI to do these things for you    Key Responsibilities   Achieve seamless scalability and optimize performance for AI powered cloud services  ensuring 99 99  uptime while delivering AI enhanced software upgrades and customizations that meet clients  evolving needs    Candidate Requirements   2  years of DevOps experience  including automation of CI CD pipelines and infrastructure management 2  years of experience with Amazon Web Services  AWS  or Google Cloud Platform  GCP  Proficiency in AI and machine learning tools used for monitoring  automation  and predictive analytics  or strong willingness to learn and adapt to AI driven technologies  Strong programming and scripting skills  with experience in automating tasks and building AI Join Driscoll s Global Research and Development team  dedicated to introducing innovative berry varieties to consumers worldwide  Our proprietary variety selection process involves cultivating new berry varieties in facilities that represent our diverse production regions  As the Test Plot Manager in Moulay Bousselham  Morocco  you will lead on farm plant care and provide technical support for our Breeding   Applied Research programs  focusing on strawberries  raspberries  blueberries  and blackberries  Your role will include managing crew activities and overseeing the establishment  cultivation  maintenance  and inventory of proprietary berry plants in both tunnels and open air fields     Responsibilities  Directly manage the test plot Technical Grower and Lead Field Supervisor Responsible for making recommendations regarding the hiring  evaluation  and discipline of research ranch staff Manage Applied Research and Breeding trials for blueberry  blackberry  strawberry  and raspberry crops in Moulay test plot Responsible for maintenance of all plants including  but not limited to  proper watering  weeding  fertilizing  transplanting  pruning  disease  and insect control in the test plot Maintains records of all treatments applied  Ensures once plant material has served its purpose it is disposed of or transported to an appropriate location in a timely manner Coordinates with stakeholders and members of Farming Operations regarding planning layout  preparation of ground  and planting of the Blueberry  Blackberry  Strawberry  and Raspberry on an annual basis Responsible for all cultural practices at test plots  including land preparation  bed preparation  and planting Ensures all plant material is labeled  inventoried and all appropriate treatments are applied to this material Ensures the harvest is done correctly and make sure that the data is collected properly Responsible for Fruits shipping for Flavor and shipping evaluation in collaboration with stakeholders and colleagues Assure a safe working environment and advocate safety compliance Responsible for equipment repairs and maintenance Responsible for labor forecasts needs and activities Performs monthly credit card expense reporting in a timely manner Maintains the overall appearance  housekeeping  and safety of test plot Follows Company policies and practices while representing Driscoll s in an ethical and business like manner in all interactions with employees  government agencies  growers  etc  Ensures the safe keeping of propriety varieties and confidential information    Candidate Profile  Bachelor s Degree Agriculture Engineering  Master s Degree in Agriculture preferred Minimum of 5 years  experience working in a commercial berry production operation or comparable horticultural operation Ability to work as part of a team and collaborate with other members of breeding  Applied Research and farming operations  always striving to achieve team goals Three plus years of experience as a team leader  supervising the work of others Solid understanding of field preparation  plant growing and plant maintenance procedures and techniques Experience with growing practices  irrigation systems and farm equipment Knowledge of pesticide laws and regulations  and pesticide applications Willingness to learn new skills to support personal and professional growth Must possess good verbal and written communication skills Speaks fluently in English Possess a valid driver s license A valid passport and the ability to travel internationally without restrictions     IMPORTANT NOTE  When applying  please include resume CV in English      About Driscolls Driscoll s is the global market leader for fresh strawberries  blueberries  raspberries and blackberries  With more than 100 years of farming heritage and hundreds of independent growers around the world  Driscoll s is passionate about growing fresh  beautiful and delicious berries  Our values of humility  passion and trustworthiness have guided our mission to delight consumers around the world  Driscoll s exclusive patented berry varieties are developed through years of research using only natural breeding methods   meaning  no GMOs  From farm to table  we focus on delivering a high quality  premium berry experience with our many supply chain partners  Driscoll s is the trusted brand for Only the Finest Berries    Driscoll s es el proveedor líder en la comercialización de Fresas  Frambuesas  Zarzamoras y Arándanos Azules en el mundo  Con más de 100 años de herencia en agricultura y cientos de productores independiente alrededor del mundo  Driscoll s es una compañía apasionada por cultivar Berries frescas  hermosas y deliciosas  Nuestros valores de humildad  pasión y confianza han guiado nuestra misión de deleitar a los consumidores en el mundo  Las variedades exclusivas de Driscoll s han sido desarrolladas a través de años de investigación usando sólo métodos de mejoramiento natural  De la granja a la mesa  nos enfocamos en ofrecer una experiencia de alta calidad con apoyo de nuestros socios de la cadena de suministro  Driscoll s es la marca de confianza de sólo las mejores Berries

About the job   At Ecolab  we believe that clean water  safe food  abundant energy  and healthy environments are fundamental to the success of businesses and the well being of people everywhere  With operations in over 170 countries  we deliver comprehensive solutions to customers in a wide range of industries  including food and beverage  healthcare  hospitality  manufacturing  and more  Our innovative technologies and sustainable practices are making a real difference in conserving resources  protecting lives  and improving the quality of life for millions around the globe  Ecolab is seeking an HR Generalist as contingent to provide strategic human resource generalist consultation to associates and managers  You will play a crucial role in the day to day administration of HR policies and programs  This encompasses various functions such as recruiting compensation and benefits  training  employee and labor relations  safety  and personnel research   What s in it For You   The opportunity to take on some of the world s most meaningful challenges  helping customers achieve clean water  safe food  abundant energy and healthy environments The ability to make an impact and shape your career with a company that is passionate about growth The support of an organization that believes it is vital to include and engage diverse people  perspectives and ideas to achieve our best    What You Will Do  Responsible for Morocco   Algeria day to day administration of policies  processes and programs covering several or all the following  recruiting  payroll  onboarding  offboarding  compensation and benefits  coaching  employee performance  legal and labor relations  Manage employee lifecycle activities including contracts  promotion or pay changes  disciplinary and exits  Provide forward thinking HR consultation on operational and process issues impacting the business and take forward suggested HR proposals for review and implementation Coach and develop managers around employee relations  performance management  goal setting and other key areas  Ensure all related processes defined from global HR are effectively executed within timeline  Identify and implement opportunities for improvement of core HR service delivery Assist associates with inquiries  concerns   needs  Act as an impartial advocate for fair   equitable treatment  Create and recommend opportunities to enhance the culture and associate engagement  Serve as a resource to both managers and associates by providing policy  systems  and procedure interpretation  Support the review   development of HR policies and processes as necessary for the business  Mitigate organizational risk by ensuring compliance with all employment laws  Partner with hiring managers and HR business partners to develop effective marketplace recruitment strategies and ensure the organization s recruiting needs are handled appropriately  Source candidates through multiple channels and conduct interviews to identify qualified candidates and partner with managers throughout the staffing process  Support effective on boarding of new hires and effective integration into the business as led by the Line Manager  Provide HR related data and reporting to leaders in order to promote data driven decision making and strategy development  Support actions of the wider HR team including related projects and regional HR initiatives  Perform other duties as needed and as assigned by line Manager      Requirements   Degree in Human Resources  Industrial Relations or Business with three to five years of human resource experience  Must be English  French and Arabic speaking   Location  Job is located in Casablanca with a requirement to travel when needed   Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion  Ecolab is committed to fair and equal treatment of associates and applicants and furthering the principles of Equal Opportunity to Employment  Our goal is to fully utilize minority  female  and disabled individuals at all levels of the workforce  We will recruit  hire  promote  transfer and provide opportunities for advancement based on individual qualifications and job performance  In all matters affecting employment  compensation  benefits  working conditions  and opportunities for advancement  Ecolab will not discriminate against any associate or applicant for employment because of race  religion  color  creed  national origin  citizenship status  sex  sexual orientation  gender identity and expressions  genetic information  marital status  age  or disability

treated in return  Our team members around the world create amazing experiences for our guests  residents  and partners through a commitment to luxury with genuine heart  We know that the best way to enable our people to deliver these exceptional guest experiences is through a world class employee experience and company culture    At Four Seasons  we believe in recognizing a familiar face  welcoming a new one and treating everyone we meet the way we would want to be treated ourselves  Whether you work with us  stay with us  live with us or discover with us  we believe our purpose is to Kasr Al Bahr  Morocco   This incredible hotel project located in the capital of Morocco sits on 15 acres and consists of 13 buildings for accommodation  restaurants  lobby  located within lush gardens  in and outdoor pools and overlooking the Atlantic Ocean   The Role of Learning Manager   We currently have an opportunity for a Learning and Development Manager to join our pre opening Four Seasons Hotel Rabat Kasr Al Bahr team in Morocco   Reporting into the Director of People and Culture  you will be responsible for developing the learning quality and experience on property  delivering workplace learning and development  performance improvement programs  and initiatives to best achieve long term business success   You will be the Cultural Advocate of the Golden Rule in every employee action in your hotel and your goal is to support our talented people by curating an impactful mix of learning needs analysis  design and delivery   Responsibilities will include identifying and implementing learning and performance improvement strategies that support the hotel s strategic direction  promoting a continuous learning culture  partnering with stakeholders to ensure leadership skills are developed  ensuring new employees are given the knowledge and skills to be successful  supporting the planning committee in assisting them to conduct management development programs and blended learning programs for their teams  analyzing potential service gaps  and evaluating the effect of training programs and initiatives  Our Ideal Learning Manager candidate will have   Hotel operations experience along with experience in a Learning and Development leadership role  and a passion for people and talent development  helping people learn and reach their full potential   You will be a Business Partner  have excellent interpersonal  relationship building and training delivery skills  have the highest level of integrity and transparency  an eye for detail  be an undisputed  employer of choice

settling disputes  and resolving grievances and conflicts  or otherwise negotiating with others    Identifies and makes recommendations for minimizing physical hazards and unsafe work practices Link: It s no secret that traditional site reliability teams struggle to keep pace with manual monitoring  reactive troubleshooting  and labor intensive deployments  The rise of AI presents a solution  but many companies fail to fully leverage its potential  resulting in systems that underperform and bottlenecks that stifle innovation  Data shows that 73  of companies struggle with deployment delays and operational downtime  primarily due to outdated processes and lack of AI driven automation  At IgniteTech  we are tackling these issues head on by building AI first cloud solutions that are designed to anticipate and prevent problems before they arise  We focus on integrating AI and machine learning into every facet of cloud infrastructure management  from automated monitoring systems to intelligent CI CD pipelines  This approach creates environments that not only self heal but also continuously evolve  reducing downtime  improving performance  and pushing the boundaries of what cloud services can do  This isn t your typical site reliability role  where you d be reacting to problems and manually intervening when things go wrong  Here  you ll lead the charge in building AI enhanced monitoring systems that detect and resolve 95  of issues before they ever reach end users  You ll also architect and manage AI automated CI CD pipelines that reduce deployment times by 30  while
